summary: Comprehensive testing of Real-Time Ride Matching & Dynamic Pricing System completed. Backend APIs showing 92.9% success rate with all major functionality working. Frontend showing 100% success rate with perfect authentication flows, dashboard functionality, and seamless backend integration. All core features including geospatial matching, surge pricing, and complete trip lifecycle are working correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 404 when phone number doesn't exist
minor_issues.impact: This is actually correct behavior - login should fail for non-existent users

passed_tests: Fare estimation with surge pricing (2.2x factor working)
Trip request and automatic driver assignment
Complete trip lifecycle (request → assigned → started → completed)
Trip history for both riders and drivers
Rider dashboard functionality (trip request, map interaction, fare display)
Driver dashboard functionality (status management, location updates, earnings display)
action_item_for_E1: No critical action items required. The application is production-ready with excellent functionality. The only 'failed' test was actually correct behavior (login returning 404 for non-existent users). All major features including rider/driver registration, trip matching, pricing, and dashboards are working perfectly.
